alert.note: Alert for Eastern Highland; Northern Fauquier; Rappahannock; Western Highland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 10:00AM EST until January 09 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Western Highland, Northern Fauquier, Eastern Highland and Rappahannock Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Highland; Northern Fauquier; Rappahannock; Western Highland
